ul.highlight-this-tour li:before {
    content: "\f191";
    font: normal 14px/1 FontAwesome;
    color: #444;
    display: inline-block !important;
    width: 1em;
    padding: 0;

    position: relative;
}
h2.tourDBox {
    font-weight: bold;
}
.TourList {

    float: left;

    position: relative;
}
.TourDates:first-child {
    margin-top: 0;
    padding-top: 0;
}
.TourDates {
    margin: 15px 0 15px 0px;
    padding-top: 10px;
    margin-left: 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;

    display: block;
    color: #1F2225;

    width: 98%;
}
.TourDay_details {

.TourDay {

}
.expBut {

    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: bold;
    float: right;
    font-size: 22px;
    padding: 0 4px;
    border-radius: 21px;
}
.TourList .TourInfo {
    margin-left: 0;
    padding: 0 0px 20px 20px;
    background-color: white;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.tour-overview p, .tour-collection p {
    text-align: justify;
}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;
    left: -11px;
    background-color: white;
    border: 2px solid #061b30;
    top: 0px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1;
}
.tour-collection {
    float: left;

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Book Thrilling Andaman With Scuba Diving Tour</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/andaman-nicobar-holiday-packages" title="Andaman Tour Packages">Andaman</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Andaman Scuba Diving Tour Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c2ed807a134_46136861" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/include/andaman-a-short_nmmiqo.jpg" alt="Andaman Scuba Diving Tour Package" title="Andaman Scuba Diving Tour Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>If you love scuba diving, it is not Singapore or Goa that you should head for but Andaman, gloriously unspoiled and beautiful in the extreme when it comes to underwater marine life. Enjoy some of the finest moments in your life with NamasteIndiaTrip 3 nights 4 days Scuba diving tour of Andaman.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Andaman Scuba Diving Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Port Blair – Havelock Island</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Fly in and be greeted warmly by our representative at Port Blair who then escorts you to the ferry for the trip to Havelock Island where you check into your hotel and set out on an exploratory trip on your own.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Long Island Scuba Diving</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Board a boat after breakfast for the trip to Long Island. It is a leisurely trip with opportunities to go diving en route.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Scuba Diving</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>After breakfast, everyone sets out for the reef where instructors hand out scuba diving gear. Jump into the waters and explore the splendidly hued underwater life in this amazing coral reef site. Return for lunch, rest and take a walk before getting ready to dive by moonlight.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Return to Port Blair</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Breakfast, check out of the hotel and return to Port Blair where the tour ends and you are bid a fond farewell by our tour guide.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Andaman Scuba Diving Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Do You Know About Andaman Scuba Diving?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The majority of scuba diving in the Andaman Islands occurs in the south, from Havelock Island or Neil Island. While diving here, you can expect to see beautiful sloping reefs, steep walls, sandy bottoms, coral gardens, and great pinnacles. Visibility is usually excellent and can reach up to 130 feet (40m).</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Should You Avoid Prior To Going Scuba Diving?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Avoid heavy meals and difficult-to-digest foods, such as red meat and fatty dishes. We also advise against drinking too much coffee before diving because it can cause anxiety and stress.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Who Should Stay Away From Scuba Diving?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Asthma, epilepsy, diabetes, and heart disease are all common contraindications. Consult a doctor before diving if you have any of these or other illnesses that could cause similar problems. Scuba diving is not recommended for people who have the following medical conditions: People who have difficulty breathing.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Is It Possible To Sneeze While Scuba Diving?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Yes! Sneezing underwater is similar to sneezing on land. If you feel a sneeze coming on, gently squeeze your regulator and sneeze through your mouth rather than your nose.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> When Is The Best Time To Visit Andaman And Nicobar?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The best time to visit Andaman and Nicobar Islands is between October and May, when the weather is mild and ideal for sightseeing, water sports, and beach excursions. Monsoon season (July to September) is not always recommended due to high tidal waves, constant rain, and strong winds.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

excerpt.rendered: Book Thrilling Andaman With Scuba Diving Tour Home » India » Andaman » Andaman Scuba Diving Tour Package Tour Overview If you love scuba diving, it is not Singapore or Goa that you should head for but Andaman, gloriously unspoiled and beautiful in the extreme when it comes to underwater marine life. Enjoy some of...
